authors.name: Mary Jordan*
authors.affiliation: Duke BioRepository & Precision Pathology Center, Duke University Hospital, Durham, NC, USA

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"7q9kd","text":"This document outlines the required criteria for pediatric colonoscopy inclusion of colon specimens collected at Duke University Hospital through the Biorepository and Precision Pathology Center (BRPC) in the Department of Pathology. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Cellular Senescence Network (SenNet) Method Development Community

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"aaopu","text":"Inclusion Criteria:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4o4qo","text":"    • Healthy patients age 5-18 years of age presenting for outpatient colonoscopy. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fe1np","text":"    • Screening may wish to focus on the following indications: abdominal pain, constipation, diarrhea,         ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"26fvs","text":"       bloating/gas, patients with normal labs and/or imaging.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fkbqi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6c660","text":"Exclusion Criteria:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ar6ah","text":"    • Systemic Illness such as diabetes is a relative exclusion but may be hard to avoid","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ask6p","text":"    • Autoimmune disease such as SLE (lupus) or rheumatoid arthritis ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4278c","text":"    • Active infectious disease such as HIV, HBV, active COVID, active (not treated) HCV","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"apctk","text":"    • Obesity (BMI \u003e 35) is a relative exclusion ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5dto5","text":"    • BMI \u003c 18.5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a9us0","text":"    • Any chemotherapy or radiation for any condition, including cancer treatment in any organ         ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dnt3r","text":"      (patients may be included with untreated or surgically only treated cancer in another organ)         ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"gfrt","text":"    • Metastatic malignancy","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7c2do","text":"    • Whole blood transfusion in the past 48 hours","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2nagq","text":"    • Inflammatory bowel disease, microscopic colitis, and infectious colitis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"82vnc","text":"    • Known inherited conditions with increased risk of colon cancer such as Lynch Syndrome, FAP, ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ujia","text":"       DNA repair defects etc ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8c33o","text":"    • Use of blood thinners other than a baby aspirin (due to increased bleeding risk)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fs1nd","text":"    • Underlying liver disease with cirrhosis or coagulopathy (due to increased bleeding risk) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4l6k","text":"       Note: while diverticulosis and colon polyps are not exclusions, we will not collect samples within","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6jg63","text":"       10 cm of these lesions. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
